chunk_text: This helps orient the teapot in 2D. When I click NextImage or PreviousImage, it moves to another image in the imageSet list. The script calls ApplyHomography for that scene point, and I place the teapot’s transform to that position. 2.2.1 Issues and Observations  Because I manually pick points for each image, the results look better.  I noticed that sometimes the rotation is not perfect, so I used referencePoints[0] as a reference for the angle.
